Storytell

  • Education

    From 2011 to 2015 I was studied in KKBAD (Kiev Construction College, Architecture and Design), and received his associate's degree. In 2015 I entered the KNUBA (Kyiv National University Construction and Architecture) and to date has refused this type of education.

  • Begin

    In 2015, I became interested in the front-end and bought a books of fron-end. After some time, I began to take courses HTML Academy in parallel. Tried different methods of layout and interested in design.

    After, I tried different interesting things at Codepen, watched courses from such famous schools like HTML Academy, LoftSchool, GeekBraing and etc.

    When I could create sites, I decided to make sites to friends and acquaintances. After a while I began to fulfill orders for freelancing. I made online store and business card websites.

  • UNIT Factory

    In the summer of 2016, I passed the test to join the UNIT Factory. Since I was one of those people who have passed the test better than the other - I took the first "pool". It was an unforgettable experience. The first few days we were taught console MAC OSX. Then we began to learn the language C, and fun is began.

    Despite the fact that I have a month, every day was there from 10 am to 11 pm every day I was interested and I was full of energy to go on.

  • Recently

    From September to the present day, I work for Reclamare. Here I work as a Full-stack developer and perform tasks of varying complexity. Also, I have experience in supporting sites on Wordpress, openCart, joomla, Laravel. Worked with Codeigniter (http://reclamare.modenacam.com).
